text: @NC_Governor They’ll make sure boys can use the girls bathrooms, allow thousands of protesters ignore health orders and destroy property, but allow a peaceful convention bringing thousands of people and millions of dollars is just a bridge too far. #DemocratRiots #RNC2020 #COVID19
